testcase.name: Test Case 25: Verify Scroll Up using 'Arrow' button and Scroll Down functionality
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to url "http://automationexercise.com".......................passed And Verify that home page is visible successfully...........................passed And Scroll down page to bottom..............................................passed And Verify text SUBSCRIPTION................................................passed And Click on arrow at bottom right side to move upward......................passed Then Verify that page is scrolled up and Full-Fledged practice website for Automation Engineers text is visible on screen.passed
